https://tmrev.io/movie/943482-Despicable Me: Minion Mayhem 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/a4decOGsC1Z0KqJsP0cUr11jzZR.jpg Gru, one of the world's greatest villains and fathers, has invented a new weapon, the Minion Gun, a machine capable of turning ordinary humans into Minions. He has let his three daughters (Margo, Edith and Agnes) in charge of training some guests. However, because of a distraction in the middle of the training, the Minion-transformed riders, along with Gru and his daughters are forced to recover Agnes' one-year anniversary adoption gift for Gru in the depths of his own laboratory. Despicable Me: Minion Mayhem
